games.summary: Scottie Barnes scored 23 points, matched a Raptors franchise record with a career-high 25 rebounds and added 10 assists for his seventh career triple-double as Toronto beat the Golden State Warriors 141-127 in overtime on Sunday. Immanuel Quickley scored 27 points, Brandon Ingram had 26 and Ja’Kobe Walter added a season-high 18 for the Raptors, who snapped a five-game home losing streak.
blurbs: ⬆️ Ja'Kobe Walter (TOR) played 33 min (season avg: 17). 18 pts, 2 reb, 3 ast.
⬆️ Will Richard (GS) played 35 min (season avg: 19). 10 pts, 7 reb, 1 ast.

games.summary: Chet Holmgren had 29 points and nine rebounds, and the Oklahoma City Thunder pulled away in the second half for a 129-104 victory over the Philadelphia 76ers on Sunday, ending a two-game skid. He scored at least 20 points for the 103rd consecutive game.
blurbs: ⬆️ Adem Bona (PHI) played 28 min (season avg: 16). 11 pts, 8 reb, 1 ast.

games.summary: Alex Sarr scored 20 points and blocked a career-best six shots to help the Washington Wizards to a 116-112 victory over the Memphis Grizzlies on Sunday night. scored 31 points and Ja Morant added 21 for Memphis (15-17), which failed to reach the .500 mark for the first time since the Grizzlies were 3-3 following a loss to the Los Angeles Lakers on Oct.
blurbs: 📋 Tre Johnson (WSH) made just his 5th start this season. 14 pts, 0 reb.

games.summary: -- — Shaedon Sharpe scored 26 points including 5 of 8 from 3-point range and the Portland Trail Blazers snapped a three-game losing streak with a 114-108 win over the Boston Celtics on Sunday. The Celtics, whose four-game winning streak was snapped, were led by Jaylen Brown with 37 points on 14 of 23 shooting.
blurbs: ⬆️ Caleb Love (POR) played 29 min (season avg: 18). 18 pts, 2 reb, 3 ast.
⬆️ Hugo Gonzalez (BOS) played 30 min (season avg: 14). 13 pts, 6 reb, 3 ast.

games.summary: INGLEWOOD, Calif. Team-oriented to the core, Leonard was actually a bit selfish by request Sunday, scoring a career-high 55 points to lift the Los Angeles Clippers to a 112-99 victory over the Eastern Conference-leading Detroit Pistons .
blurbs: 📋 Nicolas Batum (LAC) made just his 3rd start this season. 12 pts, 4 reb.
📋 Brook Lopez (LAC) made just his 3rd start this season. 7 pts, 7 reb.
⬆️ Jaden Ivey (DET) played 29 min (season avg: 15). 11 pts, 3 reb, 3 ast.

games.summary: Luka Doncic scored 34 points, LeBron James had 24, and the Los Angeles Lakers snapped their three-game losing streak with a 125-101 win over the Sacramento Kings on Sunday night. had 21 off the bench for the Lakers, who had dropped four of six and all by at least 13 points, including a 23-point demolition at the hands of Houston on Christmas Day in their previous game .
blurbs: ⬆️ Maxime Raynaud (SAC) played 35 min (season avg: 21). 16 pts, 10 reb, 2 ast.
📋 Keon Ellis (SAC) made just his 4th start this season. 2 pts, 0 reb.
⬆️ Nique Clifford (SAC) played 29 min (season avg: 18). 11 pts, 6 reb, 3 ast.
